message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.RO, cs.SY, cs.MA 

This paper is about Reinforcement Learning, which is a subfield of Machine Learning. The paper specifically focuses on the Exploration-Exploitation tradeoff, which is a fundamental problem in Reinforcement Learning. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.LG (Machine Learning), followed by cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.RO (Robotics). The paper also discusses Markov Decision Processes, which are commonly used in control systems, so cs.SY (Systems and Control) is also a possible sub-category. Finally, the paper proposes modifications to existing Reinforcement Learning algorithms, which falls under cs.MA (Multi-Agent Systems).
